scripts: // TODO: Turbopack desabilitado temporariamente por incompatibilidade com o patch do antd para React 19
scripts.start-all: concurrently -n server,client,worker1,worker2,worker3 -c yellow,cyan,green,magenta,blue "cd ../server && php artisan serve" "npm run dev" "cd ../server && php artisan queue:listen" "cd ../server && php artisan queue:listen" "cd ../server && php artisan queue:listen"
scripts.update:types: cd ../server && php artisan l5-swagger:generate && cd ../client && npx openapi-typescript ../server/storage/api-docs/api-docs.json -o src/types/api.d.ts
